name: Astronaut
description:
First game of  project GAME A WEEK: The initial idea was to play with something related to leap and gravity and high gravity. So I decided to try to make a game where the player adjusts the position of the character (astronaut) on the platform by pressing the keys A and D, and jumps to the next platform by pressing SPACE.  I could not finish it on time but I hope you enjoy it.

Controls:   A and D for move the player. SPACE to jump.
